entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to ice pellets or snow late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023
